About


emergee is a comparison platform for 3D models.

eemerge allows users to quickly compare and choose among the best models available across the Internet and print it out as they prefer.

With ease, quality and convenience.


Team

BIAGIO

Developer

GIULIANO

Business

ALESSIO

Prototyper



  1. December 2015
  2. January 2016
  3. March 2016
  4. June 2016


How it works

eemerge let users to surf its amazing galleries or search their desires. Users can easily get inspired or refine the research with criteria like quality and price, technology, printing systems and costs.

3D Printing on a fingertip

eemerge is available on every electronic device and assures full compatibility with all printers

Meet eemerge

We are three enterprising guys from Apulia with a passion for 3D printing.
We are determined to revolutionize the current production paradigm and transform the trading patterns.
We want to eliminate physical constraints between an idea and its realization.
